code: import*as d3 from'd3';d3.json("../data/vue.json").then(data=>{console.log("Partition Data:",data);const width=1000;const height=500;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size);d3.partition().size([width,height]).padding(1).round(true)(root);console.log("Partition Root:",root);const svg=d3.select("#partition svg");const color=d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.quantize(d3.interpolateRainbow,root.children.length+1));svg.selectAll("rect").data(root.descendants()).enter().append("rect").attr("x",d=>d.x0).attr("y",d=>d.y0).attr("width",d=>d.x1-d.x0).attr("height",d=>d.y1-d.y0).attr("fill",d=>color(d.depth));svg.selectAll("text").data(root.descendants()).enter().append("text").attr("x",d=>d.x0+5).attr("y",d=>d.y0+20).text(d=>d.data.name);}).catch(error=>console.error("Error loading Partition Data:",error));
